scripts.create:component: mkdir ./src/components/$npm_config_name && mkdir ./src/components/$npm_config_name/Layout && cat ./npm-templates/layout.jsx | sed s/PLACEHOLDER/$npm_config_name/g > ./src/components/$npm_config_name/Layout/index.jsx && cat ./npm-templates/component.jsx | sed s/PLACEHOLDER/$npm_config_name/g > ./src/components/$npm_config_name/index.jsx && mkdir ./src/components/$npm_config_name/Style && touch ./src/components/$npm_config_name/Style/index.css
